text:
*A).* Reachdesk - The connection setup is triggered on Reachdesk website, the oAuth rountrip goes to HubSpot where scopes are approved and done.

*B)* Google Sheets - This is initiated trough HubSpot, I go to Google oAuth screen, give HubSpot its permissions and then I can use Google Sheets actions



How are these setups different? Are they both available to developers? Are they both not just regular public apps?

Hi Team,
if anyone tell mw how to add trailing slash to hs_path in hubdb for dynamic pages ?

Hello, I'm wondering if there is a way to translate subscription pages to languges based on where the user is? I know about the translation of subscription types, but what about the other content on the page and the simple default unsubscribe page? :slightly_smiling_face:

Did anyone here get the powerbank in the developer swag a few months back? I cannot figure out how to charge it. I tried the USB C and Lightning port and neither charge it. Not sure if I just got a dud. Anyone else had issues with it?

Hello Team!
I’m working on the *Core Web Vitals* in a HubSpot site, and  the CLS values are pointing out that the LOGO module doesn’t add the height. Is there a way for that module to add the HTML height? I’ve added it in my hubl, but still doesnt show.
Id just swap the logo module for a HTML or standard image module.

I’d either second <@UDPA7JFHA> suggestion or, within your global area, override the default logo and use the “exact width and height” controls, which should output both values in the HTML (along with generate a srcset for compatible images)

Hey Nick, I use mine a good bit and have also had issues charging with USB C. Lightning does work for me though, but if it’s been depleted for some time you may need to leave it plugged in for a while to get the indicator lights back. Not 100% sure, but that would be my first try.
To go one step further, I create my own logo module since I sometimes needs the option for a different mobile version of the logo and almost always need a reverse version of the logo

yeah, I wanted to skip the option of replacing for an image. Since the site is already built. And what is the use of that default module if CWV is going to complain. Thanks guys! I’m going to take that route then!
